snippet: For the first time, a geologist has been chosen to serve on the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.
abstract: Senate Environment and Public Works Committee will meet to consider whether to approve Allison M Macfarlane, Pres Obama's nominee to head the Nuclear Regulatory Commission; discussion will likely center on the future of nuclear waste disposal in the United States, and Macfarlane's longtime criticism of the Yucca Mountain facility in Nevada.
lead_paragraph: For the first time, a geologist has been chosen to serve on the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.

headline.seo: Allison Macfarlane N.R.C. Hearing May Focus on Waste
headline.main: N.R.C. Nomination Shines Spotlight on Waste-Disposal Issue
headline.print_headline: An N.R.C. Nomination Is Shining a Spotlight On the Disposal of Waste
